deleteDemoCompany.confirmMessage:
You have requested deleting your demo company {{name}}. Deleting a demo company will remove all data related to the company in the system and the data cannot be retrieved later. This is a demo company and you can confirm your request easily by confirming here.

When you choose to delete your REAL company we send you a verification e-mail to confirm the deletion for security purposes.

Are you sure you want to delete the demo company?

deleteRealCompany.confirmMessage:
You have requested deleting your company {{name}}. Deleting a company will remove all data related to the company in the system and the data cannot be retrieved later.

You need to confirm the request. We sent you an e-mail with a link to verify your request. Please open your e-mail and follow the instructions to confirm deleting the company.

Are you sure you want to continue?

info.internationalPaymentInformationContent:
IBAN is a code that uniquely identifies your bank account for international transactions, while BIC/SWIFT code identifies the specific bank where your account is held. Both codes ensure secure and accurate transfer of money between banks around the world.

If these are available in your Bank you may use the account to accept international transfers, you can register the information by selecting the checkbox and filling out the form. The information will be printed on all invoices and sales associated with the account.

tabBankAccount.openingBalanceInfoContent:
Opening balance is brought forward from the end of the previous accounting period at the beginning of a new accounting period.

The date on which the opening balance was checked may be entered when registering the opening balance in the system.

The payment account can be used retrospectively to record sales and purchases. Transactions assigned to a date earlier than the opening balance date won't affect the opening balance and won't appear in the account's paid or received entries.

info.infoTooltipCreditNotes:
A credit note is a legal term used to indicate the cancellation of an entire or parts of an invoice. This means that you as an owner of a financial claim are remitting the entire or parts of a claim toward the customer.

By adding a credit note, you can cancel the entire or parts of the outstanding amount to be paid on an invoice. If you want to cancel the invoice entirely, you need to delete the registered payments if any first, or you can choose â€˜cancel invoiceâ€™ to delete the payments and cancel the entire invoice automatically. Any refund of payments to the customer has to be handled manually.
info.instalmentInformationContent:
To set up the terms for your instalments, select the frequency of instalments from the â€˜instalment periodâ€™ dropdown. Enter the due date and the amount of the first instalment. Click â€˜Create Planâ€™ to automatically set up an instalment plan. You may customize the instalment plan manually by adding or removing instalments and changing dates and amounts or due dates.

Any changes to the draft invoice that leads to a change in invoice amount will affect your existing instalment plan. A new plan needs to be created, or the existing one needs to be adjusted manually.

createEditCreditNote.informationMessage1: You are about to cancel parts of the invoice. This operation adds a credit note to the invoice with an amount equal to the cancellation amount you enter. The maximum amount of the invoice that can be cancelled is equal to the amount left to be paid, that is {{amount}} {{currency}}.

text.mainMessage: The given payment will be reversed and the payment will be deleted from the presented invoice payment list. However, you may find the payment and the reversal transactions in the invoice history. Any refund to the customer needs to be handled manually.
text.informMessage: The payment and its transaction will be removed from the records. However, you will find an audit log entry in the invoice history outlining the details of the action.

text.mainMessage: The cash sale payment will be reversed (nullified). You may find the payment and the reversal transactions in the payment list.

text.cancelInvoiceMessage:
You are about to cancel the entire invoice. All registered payments to this invoice will be reversed (deleted) and a credit note against the invoice amount will be created automatically. Any refund of money to the customer must be handled manually.

If you only want to cancel part of the invoice, please cancel this action and create a credit note.

Do you still want to cancel the invoice? This process is non-reversible.

confirmCreateInvoice.message: You are about to create an invoice with the amount of 0 {{type}}. Are you sure you want to continue?

text.cancelSaleMessage:
You are about to cancel the sale. The payments to this sale will be reversed (deleted). Any refund of money to the customer must be handled manually.

Do you want to cancel the sale? This process is non-reversible.

toggle.settledStatus: The invoice is settled. No follow-up is needed

settledStatus.message: The invoice is settled when there are no more payments or credit notes left to register to the invoice and the outstanding amount is 0 or the invoice is overpaid. If you register the payments or credit notes outside of the system, or you do not expect the invoice to be paid, you may change this status to settled manually. The invoice will not turn to overdue and you will not receive notifications to follow up the invoice

systemNotification.disableAccount:
Hello {{customerName}},

You have disabled your account in {{systemName}} system. Your account and all related data will be deleted after 30 days.

If you want to enable your account again, please try to sign in with your registered login information and follow the instructions provided on the page.

Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
{{systemName}} team
systemNotification.changePassword:
Hello {{customerName}}

Your password to {{systemName}} system has been changed. 

If you have not changed the password yourself, someone may have accessed your account and performed this action. If you did not request the change, you can reset your password here.

<link to forgot PW page> Forgot password

Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
 {{systemName}} team.
systemNotification.forgotPassword:
Hello {{name}}

You have requested to reset the password of your account. Please click on the link below to reset your password:

<link>Reset my password

Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
{{systemName}} team.
systemNotification.signUp:
Hello {{customerName}}

You have registered to use our online {{systemName}} accounting services system. Please click on the link below to activate your account and start using the system

<link>Activate my account

Thank you for your registration with us. Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
{{systemName}} team.
systemNotification.enableAccount:
Hello {{customerName}}

You have requested to enable your account. Please click on the link below to enable it again:

<link> Enable my account

Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
{{systemName}} team.
systemNotification.changeEmail:
Hi {{name}},

You have changed the email account associated with your account. You need to verify the new email address to be able to log in again. Please verify by clicking the button below:

<link> Verify my email address

Best regards,
{{systemName}} team

invoice.canceledInvoice:
Dear {{customerName}}

Your invoice #{{invoiceNumber}} is canceled. A credit note is attached to the email as documentation of this cancellation. You do not need to perform any actions or worry about the payment of this invoice. 

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox.

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.

Best regards,
{{companyName}}

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.
invoice.partlyCanceledInvoice:
Dear {{customerName}}

We have cancelled parts of your invoice #{{invoiceNumber}}. Please find the credit note attached to this email.
Partial cancellation of an invoice means that the invoice amount to be paid has decreased, hence you as a customer are obliged to pay less.

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox.

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.

Best regards

Best regards
{{companyName}}

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.
invoice.registeredPayment:
Dear {{customerName}}

A new payment to invoice #{{invoiceNumber}} is registered. Please see the payment details attached to this email.

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox.

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.

Best regards
{{companyName}}

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.
invoice.createdInvoice:
Dear {{customerName}}

An invoice is issued to you by {{companyName}}. Please find it attached to this email.

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox.

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.
Best regards
{{companyName}}

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.
invoice.multipleDocuments:

A list of documents related to your invoice #{{invoiceNumber}} is sent to you from {{companyName}}. Please find your documents attached to this email. 


If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox.

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.

Best regards

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.

A sale receipt is issued to you by {{companyName}}. Please find it attached to this email.

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox. 

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer.

{{companyName}}

invoice.saleIsCanceled:
Dear {{customerName}},

Your Purchase #{{invoiceNumber}} is canceled. The documentation of this cancellation is attached to this e-mail. 

If you have any questions and/or comments, please contact {{companyName}} directly. Do not reply to this message. Replies are routed to an unmonitored mailbox. 

We wish you a pleasant day, and we are happy to have you as our customer. 

Best regards, 
{{companyName}} 

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.

emailTemplate.footer: This email was sent to {{useremail}}. We respect your privacy.

company.confirmDeleteRealCompany:
You requested to delete the company {{companyName}} from {{systemName}} system. If it was not you who requested the deletion, someone may have accessed your account. In this case, please change your password to protect your account. If you requested the deletion, please click on the link below to confirm deleting your company. This will remove all data related to the company from the system, and the data cannot be retrieved later.

<link>Delete Company

The link expires after 60 minutes.

Please contact <url> us </url> if you have any questions.

Regards,
{{systemName}} team.

This is an auto-generated email by {{systemName}}. The best and easiest general-purpose accounting solution.

toggle.enabled: The sale type is enabled and can be selected for creating invoice
toggle.disabled: The sale type is disabled and can not be selected for creating an invoice

invoiceType.message:
In this section you can select the invoice types you want your company to use. Select the invoice type that is chosen by default when you create a new sale. The form that is appropriate to your selected sale type will be first displayed when you start creating an invoice or a sale receipt.

If your company is working with only one or few of the sales types you can disable those you are not using. Only the enabled sale types will be displayed as an option to use for a sale registration or invoice creation.

text.calculatedOutstandingDebt: Outstanding amount {{amount}} {{mainCurrency}} calculated based on the purchase exchange rate

error.exchangeRateMustGreaterThan0: Exchange rate must be greater than 0.

button.previewAndSendPurchaseTooltip: Select the documents (such as purchases, payment lists, etc.) you want to download to preview or send to the supplier.

settledStatus.message: The purchase is settled when there are no more payments left to register to the purchase and the outstanding amount is 0 or the purchase is overpaid. If you register the payments outside of the system, or you do not expect the purchase to be paid, you may change this status to settled manually. The purchase will not turn to overdue and you will not receive notifications to follow up the purchase

text.regretTransferMessage: The given transaction will be reversed. There will not be a deletion of the original transfer details information, but a new reversed transaction will be added to the transfer history.
text.regretTransferText: This transfer was reversed and can't be edited.
text.cancelBtnTooltip: Cancel and go back to the transfer list
text.updatePaymentAccountFail: Updating payment account information has failed

regretTransfer.informMessage: The transfer and its transaction will be removed from the records. However, you will find an audit log entry in the company event logs outlining the details of the action.
